trans-unit.source: The password must match the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: The password must match the following requirements:

trans-unit.source: At least one upper case char
trans-unit.target: At least one upper case char

trans-unit.source: At least one lower case char
trans-unit.target: At least one lower case char

trans-unit.source: Must be different from current password
trans-unit.target: Must be different from current password

trans-unit.source: The password is too short. Minimum length is %d chars
trans-unit.target: The password is too short. Minimum length is %d chars

trans-unit.source: The password must at least contain one upper case char
trans-unit.target: The password must at least contain one upper case char

trans-unit.source: The password must at least contain one lower case char
trans-unit.target: The password must at least contain one lower case char

trans-unit.source: The password must at least contain one digit
trans-unit.target: The password must at least contain one digit

trans-unit.source: The password must at least contain one special char
trans-unit.target: The password must at least contain one special char

trans-unit.source: The password must be different from the old password
trans-unit.target: The password must be different from the old password
